overview_of_class: In this course we will learn the theory and conceptual framework underlying Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT). We will explore, from an empirical perspective, the usefulness of CBT when used to treat various disorders (Mood, Anxiety, Psychotic, etc.). Additionally, we will discuss specific, clinical skills used by mental health professionals who practice CBT. Carries science credit.
name: Cognitive Behavior Therapy
subject: PSYCH
